title: Rebound Battleaxe
content:
Rebound Battleaxe Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and Attack Rolls. It's All In The Wrists: This weapon has the Thrown property and deals an additional 1d4 Thunder damage when thrown. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This axe is so loyal, it will sometimes return to wielders it favours. Battleaxe Versatile 1.8 310

Rebound Battleaxe

Versatile - Wielding With Both Han
